text_block_list.name: OP Narration
text_block_list.text: Uma Musume TV!

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
Today's guest is-! The one who won this spring's 『Oka Sho』 
and 『NHK Mile C』, history's first unorthodox double crown――

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft-san! And, her team, 
Team <Ascella>'s Trainer! Thank you for joining us!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, Trainer-san! 
We're on TV! Terrestrial TV!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Do I look okay!? 
Is my Terrestrial face fine～?

W-what kind of face is that!? For now, just calm down……! 
Let's just try to speak properly today.

W-what kind of face is that!? For now, just calm down……! 
Let's just try to speak properly today.

In front of Rhein Kraft, I tried to remain calm. But I was super 
nervous about appearing on a big show for the first time in a while!

My team, Team <Ascella>, was inherited from my father who was 
a famous trainer. The team was rebuilt from scratch starting 
with King Halo, the daughter of a famous Uma Musume, but――

My team, Team <Ascella>, was inherited from my father who was 
a famous trainer. The team was rebuilt from scratch starting 
with King Halo, the daughter of a famous Uma Musume, but――

At first, things didn't go well and we fell on hard times…… 
At one point, we didn't even have the minimum number of 
members required to keep the team from disbanding……

But now, we had Rhein Kraft, who had just 
achieved two great victories. We also had Cesario, 
a strong contender for the upcoming 『Oaks』

With 2 new rising star Uma Musume, our team suddenly 
went from a footnote to a serious contender.

With 2 new rising star Uma Musume, our team suddenly 
went from a footnote to a serious contender.

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft-san, let's start with your 
first G1 win. The 『Oka Sho』, how was it?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
The 『Oka Sho』! 
At that time……from the first step, it felt special!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I was finally able to stand on the stage I had 
admired for so long! A course shrouded in cherry 
blossoms! As I was running, it almost felt like……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I was running alongside history, together with my Tiara senpais. 
As I watched the cherry blossoms fly, my heart was full!

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
So that's what you were thinking. 
Trainer-san, in terms of the race, how was it?

Where should I start…… by taking advantage of her good position from 
an early start, I think she was able to run a near perfect race.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
That's right! 
Trainer-san taught me a lot of things before the race!

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
I see. Previously, you often ran from the middle of the 
pack, but this time you chose an aggressive proactive 
strategy, that was Trainer-san's instruction, right?

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
And then next. 
About the 『NHK Mile C』 from a few days ago……

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
It was a race where Cesario, who placed 2nd at 
the 『Oka Sho』, and Air Messiah, a rival from the 
『Genius』 Trainer's team, were not participating.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah……! But Cesario and her aren't my only rivals. Daring Heart-san 
and other Uma Musume who weren't aiming for the Tiara were there!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
It was the same distance as the 『Oka Sho』 that I won. But I 
couldn't let down my guard. It's a Mile race where girls aim 
for the top spot, regardless of the Tiara or Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
It was something that I couldn't let anyone take 
from me! Even though she was aiming for the 
『Oaks』, I made a promise with Cesario that I'd win.

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
I see…… Rhein Kraft would win the 『NHK Mile C』, 
and Cesario would win the 『Oaks』……

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, would you say that was 
originally part of Team <Ascella>'s strategy?

Yes. We thought about it alot, but……taking in to 
consideration Rhein Kraft and Cesario's aptitudes, 
I felt these races would be best for them.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I was able to achieve this double crown! 
That's why, the next 『Oaks』――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'm leaving it to my teammate…… 
No, my best friend, Cesario!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Then, Cesario! I'm counting on you. We're aiming for 
a future where Tiara Uma Musume are acknowledged more!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yeah――Kraft. 
For that future we dream of, without fail――!

text_block_list.name: Kraft & Cesario
text_block_list.text: Baton Touch!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, my hand still stings. The feeling from the 
high-five earlier, even now that warmth remains.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: What was imprinted in to my palm, were many emotions……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
First, a "Sense of Accomplishment". The pride 
of obtaining an unorthodox double crown. Then――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
――an "Unfulfilled Dream". The future of the 
Tiara that the two of us built together. And――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Though very faint……an unshakable "Regret".

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
As someone who admires the Tiara as much as 
Kraft, I can understand. What it felt like to 
choose the 『NHK Mile C』 over the 『Oaks』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
But that's why, I've inherited Kraft's feelings 
towards the 『Oaks』……without a doubt!

Yeah, me too……I feel the same. 
For Kraft's sake, we can't afford to lose.

Yeah, me too……I feel the same. 
For Kraft's sake, we can't afford to lose.

I was well aware of how emotional and important 
the baton that Kraft had passed to us was.

"This was the correct decision". We would prove that. 
Team <Ascella> will definitely take both spring Tiaras.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes――we'll win. 2400m is the distance I'm best at. 
It's the one weapon I was born with.
